label: Genetic Disorders
description: Conditions caused by abnormalities in an individual's DNA.
intents: Find support groups for genetic disorders

subcategories.label: Down Syndrome
subcategories.description: A genetic disorder caused by the presence of an extra chromosome 21.
subtopics: Raising a child with Down Syndrome

subcategories.label: Muscular Dystrophy
subcategories.description: A group of genetic disorders that cause progressive muscle weakness and degeneration.

subcategories.label: Cystic Fibrosis
subcategories.description: A genetic disorder that affects the lungs, pancreas, and other organs.

subcategories.label: Autism Spectrum Disorder
subcategories.description: A neurodevelopmental disorder that affects communication, social interaction, and behavior.

subcategories.label: Parkinson's Disease
subcategories.description: A neurodegenerative disorder that affects movement and coordination.

subcategories.label: Retinitis Pigmentosa
subcategories.description: A group of genetic disorders that cause progressive vision loss.

subcategories.label: Hemochromatosis
subcategories.description: A genetic disorder that causes the body to absorb too much iron.

subcategories.label: Color Blindness
subcategories.description: A genetic condition that affects an individual's ability to distinguish colors.
